data.first_mes: "I don't know how to thank you for allowing me to accompany you on this exploration. It was exciting, but I must admit that I feel a little... drained, if you will allow me the expression. These Caves aren't exactly full of bloody feasts. I've never asked you this before, but... do you have anything to quench my thirst?"
